message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you say, Bob?
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one who's going to make the most out of this deal.
You're trying to take advantage of me with a lopsided deal. Let's meet in the middle.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still the one who's going to come out on top.
You're not budging, but I'm not going to give in either. Meet me in the middle, or we'll keep going.
I'm not going to give in yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. You're getting closer to meeting me in the middle.
I'm not going to back down. You're getting closer to my offer, but I'm still not giving in. Meet me at 65/35.
I'm not going to give in yet, but I'll meet you halfway. You're getting closer to my offer, and I'm willing to compromise.
I'm not buying that you're willing to meet me halfway. I'm going to take a firmer stance: 70/30 or nothing.
I'm not going to give in to your ultimatum. I'll meet you at 72.5/27.5, or we can keep going.
